title: ocean week trolling my web page. keeps opening up when i have other pages open stoppp it riot
body: ocean week trolling my web page. keeps opening up when i have other pages open stoppp it riot

replies.body: Hey HippoHunt3r,  I'm a frontend developer here in Oceania - can you help me understand your problem?  If you can pass along what browser you are using, and steps to reproduce, I'll have a look into it!
